name: NeurochainAI
description: NeurochainAI is revolutionizing the AI compute market with a consumer-grade hardware network to enable the AI-driven digital world. It is tapping into a $1.8T AI market by providing developers and SMBs with all the tools required to efficiently build, deploy, and run AI dApps under one platform: Consumer-grade GPU DePIN, Community-powered data collection & validation, Marketplace of quantized AI models, Interoperability tools, dApp Store. Tech progress: ☑️ Quantized AI models in BETA: LLM, Text-to-Speech, Speech-to-Text, Image generation AI, custom proprietary models e.g. loan risk assessment, sentiment analysis. ☑️ GPU DePIN for AI Inference in BETA ☑️ Community data collection and validation in BETA ☑️ Mainnet LIVE (no token distribution yet) NeurochainAI aim to be a leading AI network for future AI powered apps.
